text: Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei (; born 16 November 1960) is an Iranian conservative politician. He was a cabinet member during the President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad administration. He was the First Vice President of Iran for one week in 2009 until his resignation was ordered by Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.Ahmadinejad grooms chief-of-staff to take over as Iran's president, Saeed Kamali Dehghan 21 April 2011 ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Iran
title: Esfandiar Rahim Mashaei
